properties.name: Afghan Gallery Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 327 Brunswick St Fitzroy 3065 VIC Authentic Afghan dishes. Highly recommended. Good idea to book ina dvance sometimes very crowded. Daily 6pm-11pm Middle Eastern Cuisine notes: Afghan Entree: -6 Mains: 4.50-0.50 Dessert: Payment accepted: MasterCard, Visa, Diners Club, American Express and EFTPOS Licensed with bar. Wine is available by the glass. BYO (wine only) .50 corkage per person. Vegetarian options available

properties.name: Conservatory
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 8 Whiteman St, Southbank, VIC 3006From website : With soaring ceilings and views over the river to the CBD, Conservatory is an elegant and relaxed place to dine at any time of day. Enjoy a wide range of tasty and creative buffet dishes by Chef de Cuisine Milton Ploss, offering the best of Eastern and Western cuisine. Seafood is a highlight; with a mountain of fresh prawns, daily fish dishes and freshly-shucked oysters. For dessert there\'s a wide range of sweet treats, including Conservatory\'s famous chocolate fountain. An à la carte menu is also available - and don\'t miss Tiffin Afternoon Tea, a deliciously decadent way to spend a Sunday afternoon. The Conservatory Lounge overlooks the dramatic Crown Atrium and serves espresso coffee, a wide range of teas, sumptuous wines and Champagnes, boutique beers and an array of delicious cocktails. My review, expensive.Night buffets are always sumptuous. Go for the seafood.

properties.name: Copacabana International
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 139 Smith St Fitzroy Vic Buzzy, Clubby, Live music, Relaxed, Traditional Hours Mon: 6pm – 10pm Tue: 6pm – 10pm Wed: 6pm – 10pm Thu: 6pm – 10pm Fri: 6pm – 10pm Sat: 6pm – 10pm Sun: 6pm – 10pm Good atmosphere, had my B\'day there. Food was buffet style churasaria, BBQ meat, all you can eat . South american dancing shows

properties.name: Gypsies Cafe Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 102 Smith St Collingwood vic 3066Australian Modern, $ Open tues-sat 7am-4pm; sun 8am-4pm; Licensed, BYO bottled wine only, Corkage bottle; No cards The Age Cheap Eats 2006 Gypsies Cafe executes a familiar formula in a particularly pleasant way. Basic all-day brekkie options are complemented by a huge blackboard menu, but the waiters are happiest when asked simply for a Big Warm Hug (aka porridge with honey and fruit

properties.name: Jaipur Curry Bar
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb Near authentic Indian eatery. quite popular among the local Indians, indicates how good the food is. Screening of bollywood movies on plasma sometimes distracting but does give a unique ambiance to the rather crampy place. Try the briyani rice or the naan bread.

properties.name: Mamma Vittoria Pasta Classica
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 352 Smith St, COLLINGWOOD 3066 vic australia Herald Sun Cafe Culture Donna Coutts 26/7/05 score 13/20 "Pasta Classica\'s main business is selling fresh, take-home pasta. But it\'s a busy little lunch spot on a weekday. Today six or eight blokes in royal blue boiler suits are lining up for takeaway containers of whatever is in the bain-marie. There are a few eating in, too, at basic tables and on old vinyl chairs." Age, Eat Streets, John Leathlean, "Family Affair" 22/9/02

properties.name: Old Kingdom
properties.description: Posted by Rizzimelb 197 smith street fitzroy Speciality is duck, Peking duck is the best one in town. Beware you have to make booking in advance especially Friday night or weekends. Always buys on weekends. 3 course Peking duck dinner.
